title: Store "Not yet Implemented" Bug
body: Anyone else having a bug in the store that has everything tagged as "Not yet Implemented"? It is making everything unbuyable for me, nothing from it is working.

replies.body: It's been through the store page every time, hence why the title mentioned Store. Also my post states what's going on, how to fix it would be helpful

It seems like you're trying to buy champions through the collection page, but for the time being, you'll need to go to the actual store in order to purchase anything. Hit me back up if that's where you're trying to make those purchases and we can look into whats really going on.
